name: DOMI DEVELOPMENT PRIVATE COMPANY
goal:
The main areas of economic development of the Company are:
1.Planning, Submission, Integration and Implementation of Transnational Projects for third parties and for itself, in programs such as cross-border INTERREG2 as well as specific programs
2.Planning, Submission, Integration and Implementation of Targeted Projects under ESPA 2014-2020, ΠΑΑ 2014-2020 / CLLD
3.Developmental Development of Special Private Development Investments in Greece and Abroad
4.Implementation of co-funded Projects of Public, Larger Public Sector and NGO
5.Design of Business Programs and Road Maps for the Development of Innovative Interventions
6. Support partner companies abroad for participation in competitions of the Greek government
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Culture, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
